casebody.data:
Douglas Scott DUBIN, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Contessa Lynn FINCHER, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157369
COA: 339175 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of Michigan Protection and Advocacy Service, Inc., to participate as amicus curiae and to file an amicus brief is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on April 30, 2018, is accepted for filing.
